jd: From: Nishtha, siriinfo nishtha.t@siriinfo.com Reply to: nishtha.t@siriinfo.com Role name:Business AnalystRole Description:o Document business needs and features.o Document As-Is and To-Be business processes.o Facilitate User Story grooming sessions and create user stories.o Identify and document business and technical requirements for various features.o Conduct data analysis and data mapping on various features.o Create and maintain a streamlined documentation for all the services effort. This includes content like: Design Documents, Business/System Process flows, Source Data Mapping, StoredProc used by API, Session log events, Test support documentation, etc.o Document UAT Test Scenarios, conduct UAT testing and facilitate UAT Training sessions.Competencies:Business Analysis, Usability Analysis and Evaluation Techniques Branch | City | Location:Minneapolis, MN--RegardsNishthaSiri Info Solutions.Direct: 848-455-4057 EXT. 3161Mail Id: nishtha.t@siriinfo.comDisclaimer: We respect your online privacy.
